title: Nicky Morgan – 2016 Speech at Floreat School
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Nicky Morgan, the Secretary of State for Education, at Floreat School in Wandsworth, London on 21 January 2016.
content:
[![nickymorgan](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/nickymorgan.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/nickymorgan.jpg)
